title: Boochamma Boochodu
text: Boochamma Boochodu is a 2014 <a href="Telugu%20cinema">Telugu</a> <a href="Horror%20film">Horror</a>-<a href="Comedy%20film">Comedy film</a> directed by Rewan Yadu. The film features a honeymooning couple, Karthik (Shivaji) and Sravani (Kainaaz Motiwala),in their new farm house are punctuated by an aberration - ominous signs of the palatial house. The mysterious of the terrorizing spirits form the storyline. Supporting cast include comedians <a href="Brahmanandam">Brahmanandam</a>, <a href="Vennela%20Kishore">Vennela Kishore</a>, <a href="Posani%20Krishna%20Murali">Posani Krishna Murali</a>, Venu, Tagubothu Ramesh, Dhanraj and Chammak Chandra.
